content:

### Events
- First amendment denial: rejected covenant reset for restaurant franchisee — insufficient restructuring plan
- Third maturity extension request from mid-market industrials company
- LP advisory committee meeting: consent items approved

### Notes
- First denial of the month. Amendment backlog at 9 pending. PIK elections at 7. Revolver draw rate approaching 48%. Borrowers sub-1.5x ICR now at 20, up from 12 at month start. Base rate moves flowing through to portfolio yield.
